description:
Mito is the sergeant-at-arms of the Castle and http://anidb.net/ch97397 [Jhil]`s retainer. He has a patch over his right eye and suffers from the same disease that Jhil has, the ossifying of the bones, just to a lesser degree. He complains that the poisons in his body will turn his right hand to "stone". http://anidb.net/ch7803 [Nausicaä] calls him Uncle Mito.
Source: Nausicaä Wiki
name: Mito
